text: HRrdy <cfry <THTf giferarut PHONE 91-11-5074100 /5074200 (439 QarA 3r ToTArf +ATc4) Fax 91-11-5080360 / 5080460 Extn: 2223/2318 /2468 /2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6 SECTOR-10, DWARKA, NEW DELHI-110045 No.11041/21/2002-Admn.III August 2, 2002 POLICY MATTERS_ ADMINISTRATIONFINANCE (12/2002) (Decision taken on Technical Division's File No.NHAI/2O030/3AJNS-1/Const/gg-Tech:) MAINTENANCE ANDRELEASE QF BANK GUARANTEES It has been decided that the following procedure shall be followed uniformly in respect of the maintenance and release of the Bank Guarantees submitted by the Consultants and the Contractors: All the Bank Guarantees shall be maintained by the concerned Divisions at Headquarters: A copy of such BGs shall be forwarded to the concerned PIUs for monitoring: (i) It shall be the responsibility of the PIU to monitor the validity of the BGs (a Register shall be maintained for this purpose) and ensure extension of validity of the BGs in terms of the contract provisions, as and when required. iii) For release of the Bank Guarantees, the proposal shall be forwarded by the PIUs with their recommendations in accordance with the contract conditions , to the Headquarters. (iv) The release of BGs shall be approved by the MemberICGM of the concerned Division with the concurrence of the Finance Division. This issues with the approval of the Chairman, NHAI. 0 angcuollau (S.
